name: string - The name of the habit
goal: string - Clear, specific goal for the habit
start_date: string - ISO 8601 timestamp (will be set when user adds to calendar)
description: string - Detailed description of the habit
motivation: string - Why this habit matters to the user
tracking_method: string - How progress will be measured

milestones.completion_criteria: string - Specific criteria to complete this milestone
milestones.target_days: number - Optional: target days to reach this milestone

low_level_schedule.span_interval: number | null - How many times to repeat (null = infinite)

steps.time: string - Time in HH:MM format (for daily) or null
steps.day: string - Day of week (for weekly) or null
steps.day_of_month: number - Day of month (for monthly) or null
steps.day_of_year: string - Day of year (for yearly) or null
steps.interval_days: number - For every-n-days, how many days between
steps.instructions: string - What the user should do

program.duration_weeks: number - How long this phase lasts
program.goal: string - What this phase aims to achieve

steps.instructions: string - What the user should do
steps.success_criteria: string - How to know this step is complete

reminders.days_before: number - Optional: how many days before to remind
